CustomField.formula: IF(OR( Tower__c = 'The S' || Tower__c = 'One Park Avenue Tower' || Tower__c = '310 Riverside Crescent' || Tower__c = '320 Riverside Crescent' || Tower__c = '330 Riverside Crescent' || Tower__c = '340 Riverside Crescent' || Tower__c = '350 Riverside Crescent' || Tower__c = '360 Riverside Crescent' || Tower__c = 'Waves Grande' || Tower__c = 'SCVR - A' || Tower__c = 'SCVR - B' || Tower__c = 'Waves' || Tower__c = 'Sobha Waves Opulence' || Tower__c = 'SSH - Tower A' || Tower__c = 'SSH - Tower B' || Tower__c = 'SSH - Tower C' || Tower__c = 'Sobha One Tower A' || Tower__c = 'Sobha One Tower B' || Tower__c = 'Sobha One Tower C' || Tower__c = 'Sobha One Tower D' || Tower__c = 'Sobha One Tower E' || Tower__c = 'Verde' || Tower__c = 'Orbis Tower A' || Tower__c = 'Orbis Tower E' || Tower__c = 'Orbis Tower B' || Tower__c = 'Orbis Tower F' || Tower__c = 'Orbis Tower G' || Tower__c = 'Sobha One - Podium' || Tower__c = 'Sobha Hartland II Villas' || Tower__c = 'Sobha Hartland II Mansion' || Tower__c = 'Skyscape Avenue' || Tower__c = 'Skyscape Aura' || Cluster_Name__c = 'Selene Beach Residences' || Tower__c = 'Sobha Siniya Island' || Cluster_Name__c = 'Delphine Beach Residences' || Tower__c = 'Skyscape Altius'), C1_Amount__c + C1_CGST__c + C2_Amount__c + C2_CGST__c + C3_Amount__c + C3_CGST__c + C7_Amount__c + C7_CGST__c, IF(OR( Tower__c = 'Phase II' || Tower__c = 'A' || Tower__c = 'B' || Tower__c = 'C' || Tower__c = 'D' || Tower__c = 'Crest Grande - Retail' || Tower__c = 'Retail' || Tower__c = 'Crest Grande - Tower B' || Tower__c = 'Crest Grande - Tower A' || Tower__c = 'Crest Grande - Tower C' || Tower__c = 'Creek Vistas Grande' || Tower__c = 'Sobha Reserve'), C1_Amount__c + C1_CGST__c + C2_Amount__c + C2_CGST__c + C3_Amount__c + C3_CGST__c, IF(Tower__c = 'Phase I' || Tower__c = 'Phase I - Building 1' || Tower__c = 'Phase I - Building 4' || Tower__c = 'Phase II - Building 2' || Tower__c = 'Phase II - Building 3', C1_Amount__c + C1_CGST__c + C4_Amount__c + C4_CGST__c + C6_Amount__c + C6_CGST__c, IF(OR(Tower__c = 'Phase III - Building 5' || Tower__c = 'Phase III - Building 6' || Tower__c = 'Tower A' || Tower__c = 'Townhouse'), C1_Amount__c + C1_CGST__c + C4_Amount__c + C4_CGST__c + C6_Amount__c + C6_CGST__c, IF(OR(Tower__c = 'Tower B' || Cluster_Name__c = 'Sobha Creek Vista Heights' || Cluster_Name__c = 'The Crest' || Tower__c = 'Phase IV'), C1_Amount__c + C1_CGST__c + C2_Amount__c + C2_CGST__c + C3_Amount__c + C3_CGST__c, IF(OR(Tower__c = 'Sobha Tranquility' || Tower__c = 'Waterside Plots' || Tower__c = 'Hartland Extension' || Tower__c = 'Phase III'), C1_Amount__c, 0 ) ) ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Total Installment
